item.description:
ATTENTION ATTENTION LAST MINUTE NOTIFICATION FROM THE CARVER DEN !!!!!!!

THERE WILL "NO CLASS" DUE TO THE CARVER DEN'S MEMBER HOLIDAY PARTY,

HOWEVER THOSE THAT PLANNED TO ATTEND TO ASSIST WITH GIFT WRAPPING AS SCHEDULED,

IT IS STILL PLANNED!! THIS WILL BE A FESTIVE TIME FOR ALL.

WE JUST WILL NOT HAVE A CLASS.

REMINDER - Bring your donated unwrapped toy gift to The Den. Educational toys for age 3-12 No toddler gifts. they do not want the responsibility of a toddler getting hurt with one of the gifts from them. Non violent toys.


We will be helping to wrap gifts. .

In 2011 the fee will be just $10pp for comprehensive lessons from our Certified Steppin' Instructors, quality practice time, open dance and a great evening out.

group.name: The Original Steppers of Boston Inc. 2006

item.name: "Chicago Style" Steppin' Dance Class & Practice at The Den
